resources.string:
Rules: 
 1. Put coefficient in the beginning, like 4xyz 

 2. Use ^ to indicate power, negative power is supported, like x^3 or y^-1 

 3. Use & to separate term, like 4x&+2y to represent 4x+2y 

4. For subtraction and multiplication, the operation starts from the current tab. Like, clicking the multiplication button on INPUT 2 will give the result of (INPUT2)(INPUT1) and vice versa 

5. If you love math, math will NOT love you! Math is a jerk, you know. 

 Contact: ZipZapRex@gmail.com
